home.page-desc-1: All of our 50 oversized guest rooms and suites are tastefully decorated with stunning mountain      views and are suitable for groups and events, business or pleasurable romantic getaway.
home.page-desc-2: Many room amenities ensure a comfortable, relaxing and convenient stay. Each Sea to Sky Hotel      room includes:

rooms.page-desc-1: All of our 50 oversized guest rooms and suites are tastefully decorated with stunning mountain      views and are suitable for groups and events, business or pleasurable romantic getaway.
rooms.page-desc-2: Many room amenities ensure a comfortable, relaxing and convenient stay. Each Sea to Sky Hotel      room includes:

room-types.name: deluxe room
room-types.desc: 300 SQ/FT. Deluxe room with Two Queen beds with private balcony, 37'' LCD screen television with premium cable channels, microwave, mini- refrigerator, desk/work space

room-types.name: deluxe family room
room-types.desc: 380 SQ/FT. Deluxe Family room with Two Queen/One King Bed, private balcony, 37” LCD screen television with premium cable channels, microwave, mini- refrigerator, desk/work space, AM/FM clock radio, air-conditioning, coffee maker, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, complimentary wireless internet and parking.

room-types.name: deluxe one bedroom suite
room-types.desc: 600 SQ/FT. Deluxe suite with large sitting area, 37” LCD television, one King bed, one separate bedroom with one Queen bed with 32” LCD television. Private balcony, microwave, mini- refrigerator, desk/work space, AM/FM clock radio, air-conditioning, coffee maker, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, complimentary wireless internet and parking.

facilities.page-desc-1:
As the major Banquet & Conference Center in Squamish and the leading hotel location for upscale meetings in the Sea to Sky corridor, the Sea to Sky Hotel has raised the bar on meeting planner expectations.

From first class service to unmatched surroundings, we insure your next meeting will be a successful one.

The Sea to Sky Hotel Banquet and Conference Centre is located in the Garibaldi Provincial Park on the Sea to Sky Hwy, a few minutes north of Squamish and a 30 minutes drive to Whistler.
facilities.page-desc-2: This Lodging Facility offers 7,200 square feet of the most inviting meeting space in the Squamish area:
fac-features: Four meeting rooms including the Sea to Sky Ballroom accommodating over 200 guests.
Complimentary wireless access in all meeting rooms and lobby.

bw-subs.title: Premier Beer & Wine Store
bw-subs.desc: The Sea to Sky Beer and Wine Store is nestled in the Garibaldi Provincial Park on the Sea to Sky Hwy, a few minutes north of Squamish. We are the premier destination for specialty wines, craft, local and import ales and lagers, and preferred spirits.

bw-subs.title: Wine
bw-subs.desc: We have a large BC Wine selection, including fine exclusive VQA, specialty and organic wines from Okanagan boutique wineries. We've listened to you and strive to provide amazing selections of hard-to-find and preferred favorites for your enjoyment and pleasure.

bw-subs.title: Spirits
bw-subs.desc: We are not just a beer and wine store. We carry a wide selection of distilled spirits as well. Our selection includes many premier and upscale spirits.

contactus.page-desc-1: If you have questions, concerns or comments you'd like to share with us please don't hesitate to contact us through one of the channels here.
contactus.form-desc: Your questions and feedback are extremely important to us. We will respond to your questions and comments as quickly as we can.
contactus.contact-desc: We are also available by phone, mail, or in person.
